mapper.insert: insert into market (mar_title, mar_price, mar_contents, mar_addr1, mar_addr2, mar_addr3, mar_cate, mar_user_no, mar_crea_nick_name) values (#{marTitle}, #{marPrice}, #{marContents}, #{marAddr1}, #{marAddr2}, #{marAddr3}, #{marCate}, #{marUserNo}, #{marCreaNickName})
mapper.update: UPDATE market SET mar_title=#{marTitle}, mar_price=#{marPrice} mar_contents=#{marContents}, mar_addr1=#{marAddr1}, mar_addr2=#{marAddr2}, mar_addr3=#{marAddr3}, mar_cate=#{marCate}, mar_up_dt=NOW(), WHERE mar_No=#{marNo}
mapper.select: select mar_no from market where mar_del_yn = 'n' and mar_user_no = #{marUserNo} order by mar_no desc limit 0,1
